resources.string:
A very simple tip calculator
This app is my first app on the Play store.
The purpose of this app was to learn how to deploy :)
Created by Cody Huzarski (Tassit), August 2014
 Thank You
Cannot split a bill among nobody
Need a bill to work with

The total tip comes to: $%1$,.2f
Everything altogether is: $%2$,.2f
Each person tips: $%3$,.2f
Each Person owes: $%4$,.2f
The total tip comes to: $%1$,.2f\nEverything altogether is: $%2$,.2f
